9000.description: Port for Minio services including API and Portal access. Suggested default: 9000
9000.label: Minio main port

/export.description: Choose a share for all data in Minio.
/export.label: Data Storage

MINIO_ACCESS_KEY.description: Custom username or access key of 5 to 20 characters in lenght.
MINIO_ACCESS_KEY.label: Custom Access Key

MINIO_SECRET_KEY.description: Custom password or secret key of 8 to 40 characters in length.
MINIO_SECRET_KEY.label: Custom Secret Key

MINIO_BROWSER.description: To disable web browser access, set this value to 'off'. Otherwise set to 'on'.
MINIO_BROWSER.label: Web Browser Access

Minio.description: Minio is a distributed object storage server built for cloud applications and devops.
